title: DELIRIOUS Definition & Meaning - Merriam-Webster
text: delirious adjective de·lir·i·ous di-ˈlir-ē-əs 1 : of, relating to, or characteristic of delirium delirious mutterings 2 : affected with or marked by delirium delirious with fever delirious fans deliriously adverb deliriousness noun Love words? Need even more definitions? Merriam-Webster unabridged
